dialogue.introduction: Good day, Admiral. I'm I-401, the second ship in the special submarine series. Just call me Shioi.
dialogue.library_intro: I'm I-401, the second ship in the I-400 submarine series. I'm a submarine carrier capable of making a round trip around the world, and carries 3 units of the special attack plane "Seiran". Yes, it's a secret strategic weapon... it's a secret, okay?
dialogue.secretary2: Can I dive yet? Can I dive yet?
dialogue.secretary3: Please don't touch my hangar tubes that much.
dialogue.secretaryidle: Umm... the canal, can we go to the canal?
dialogue.secretarymarried: Hmm? What's up? Are you tired? Admiral, you shouldn't work so hard.
dialogue.wedding: Admiral... did.. I do well? Really? You're not lying? Well, that's great! Then, can I ask for a favour from the admiral? Yeah, just one... okay?
dialogue.show_players_score: Umm, here is the admiral and the fleet's information.
dialogue.equipment1: Ah, this is great, this is really great!
dialogue.equipment2: Hurray! I think this is a great modernization!
dialogue.supply: Ah, thank you! I'll use them wisely!
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: I'll go take a quick splash!
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: A nice long bath is fine too! Yeah!
dialogue.docking_complete: It seems that repairing has finished.
dialogue.ship_construction: Seems like a new girl has arrived. Wonder what she's like?
dialogue.return_from_sortie: Operation complete. The fleet has returned!
dialogue.start_a_sortie: It's showtime for the I-400 series!
dialogue.battle_start: Now... the battle for the I-400's begin here!
dialogue.air_battle: Seiran and oxygen torpedoes. These should work!
dialogue.night_battle: Alright, let's go through another night!
dialogue.night_attack: Seiran and oxygen torpedoes. These should work!
dialogue.artillery_spotting: Seiran and oxygen torpedoes. These should work!
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: Seiran and oxygen torpedoes. These should work!
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: Seiran and oxygen torpedoes. These should work!
dialogue.mvp: Ah, I did it? Hurray! The I-400's are good, after all.
dialogue.moderately_damaged: Guh, I got hit for a good one. I can still keep going, so don't underestimate me!
dialogue.sunk: I wonder if I ran wild enough this time round. A ship really sinks when they're sunk, huh. Bye bye.
dialogue.new_year_2016: Admiral, could you please think of an operation where I can actually play an active role. Seriously, I'm begging you!

hourly.0000: 0000. Thank you for your hard work, admiral.
hourly.0100: 0100. I'm a bit sleepy... oh, I'm still awake.
hourly.0200: 0200. Admiral, should you sleep now? Really? You're such a hard worker.
hourly.0300: 0300. Admiral, I'm going to lie down a bit, okay? Zzz...
hourly.0400: 0400. Mm, mmm... it's almost morning, huh... Oh well, let's keep going!
hourly.0500: 0500. It's the morning! Ok-ay! Time to do my best, yeah!
hourly.0600: 0600. Admiral, it's morning! The morning! Want to do a morning dive?
hourly.0700: 0700. Let's have breakfast! What should I have? Mozuku, perhaps?
hourly.0800: 0800. Admiral, was breakfast good? Good to hear!
hourly.0900: 0900. It's almost time for a real operation now! What say?
hourly.1000: 1000. Yeah. I don't really like destroyers and light cruisers equipped with anti-submarine equipment.
hourly.1100: 1100. Admiral, it'll be noon soon. What would you like? For lunch, that is.
hourly.1200: 1200. Woohoo! It's lunchtime! I wonder if I can send half the crew onshore...
hourly.1300: 1300. The lunch was great, admiral. Nothing beats curry at lunch.
hourly.1400: 1400. I'm going for a short dive with a submarine-only fleet.
hourly.1500: 1500. Admiral, the ranking have been updated. Do you wish to check?
hourly.1600: 1600. Hmm... I am feeling a bit tired. Admiral, want to take a short rest?
hourly.1700: 1700. It'll be evening soon. Phew, I sure am beat. What would you like for dinner?
hourly.1800: 1800. Admiral, the sun has set already? Shall we call it a day?
hourly.1900: 1900. Admiral, the night view here is great too. I really like it.
hourly.2000: 2000. Let's have dinner now. I can't wait to find out what we're having!
hourly.2100: 2100. Phew, this sure was a tiring day. Guess I'll sleep after maintaining my Seiran.
hourly.2200: 2200. The night is getting deep. I've finished maintaining the Seiran, so why don't you take a rest?
hourly.2300: 2300. Admiral, shouldn't you sleep now? Sleep is important, you know?
